author: Angelica Ang, Andrew Staples
title: DBS, Southeast Asia’s largest bank, partners with VC giant Granite Asia to counter the region’s lack of capital
description: The partnership launches with a new $110 million fund, exclusively for DBS's wealth clients, that targets IPO-stage AI and tech startups in the region.
content: DBS, Southeast Asias largest bank, and Granite Asia, an Asia-focused investment fund, are launching a new first-of-its-kind partnership to support new startups, underpinned by a new $110 million AI-f… [+3880 chars]

author: sneedleman@businessinsider.com (Sarah E. Needleman)
title: I work in recruiting tech. Here's how the smartest candidates use AI differently in their job search.
description: A longtime HR pro says AI is making everyone's résumé look the same, when it can provide job seekers with so much more value.
